:: Bat-probes::

Bats-bot had been flying in diferent ways. One of them, flied over a 
field and a red-ray appeared from its eyes at a point of the fied, 
and the bat retunred to Vamprah's lair; other was flying over sea, as 
soon as its scanner find a DNA signature, its  returned too. 

The same happened several times, until the bat bots got the DNA 
signatures that Vamprah needed.

But most of bat-probes didn't return... yet.
